972360.name: Skeletal Dance Party - Soundtrack
972360.description:
The official soundtrack of Skeletal Dance Party.

Track list:
1. Gucha's Theme (2:14)
2. Reva's Theme (2:10)
3. Eek's Theme (3:25)
4. Frankie's Theme (2:21)
5. Funnybones Theme (2:25)
6. Sybil's Theme (3:11)
7. Bethany's Theme (2:09)

The Skeletal Dance Party soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as MP3 files. Once installed you can find the MP3 files by going to your library in Steam, right clicking Skeletal Dance Party - Soundtrack and selecting Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files.
972360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
